metadata.title: Novel approaches to material use and reuse in Victorian-Era Melbourne, Australia; New insights from stable light isotope analysis and scanning electron microscopy of fiber artifacts

authors_verbatim: Martens Tracy; Cameron Judith; Stuart-Williams Hilary; Kurpiel Rebekah; Myers Sarah

labels.rationale:
Historical archaeology 
study of textiles from a 
Victorian-era cesspit in 
Melbourne. 

SEM and stable isotope
analysis were conducted 
at La Trobe University and
ANU; 

No CMCA involvement.
